  Item 8.01.  Other Events.  
                             
Wells Fargo & Company (the “Company”) issued a
press release announcing the final results of 
the previously announced cash tender offers   
for certain outstanding debt securities of the
Company by Wells Fargo Securities, LLC, its   
indirect wholly-owned subsidiary. A copy of   
the press release is attached as Exhibit 99   
and is incorporated herein by reference.
